LanguageData.TuTien_Realm_Mortal_Desc: The starting realm for all cultivators. No special abilities.
LanguageData.TuTien_Realm_QiCondensation_Desc: First cultivation realm. Learning to condense and manipulate qi energy.
LanguageData.TuTien_Realm_FoundationEstablishment_Des: Establishing a solid foundation for higher cultivation.
LanguageData.TuTien_Realm_GoldenCore_Desc: Forming the golden core, a major milestone in cultivation.
LanguageData.TuTien_Talent_Rare_Desc: Above-average cultivation talent with faster progress.
LanguageData.TuTien_Talent_Genius_Desc: Exceptional talent with significant cultivation bonuses.
LanguageData.TuTien_Talent_HeavenChosen_Desc: Blessed by heaven with extraordinary talent and high chance for techniques.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_SteadyMind_Desc: Mental resilience reduces stress and improves mood stability.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_EnhancedVitality_Desc: Qi enhances life force, increasing maximum health.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiForce_Desc: Channel qi to enhance physical attacks for a short duration.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiWave_Desc: Project a wave of qi energy at distant enemies.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiAbsorption_Desc: Absorb environmental qi to reduce incoming damage.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_CalmMind_Desc: Advanced mental discipline provides greater stress resistance.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiBody_Desc: Body strengthened with qi, reducing all incoming damage.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiBarrier_Desc: Create a qi barrier that blocks multiple attacks.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiSword_Desc: Manifest sword qi to strike multiple nearby enemies.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiPurification_Desc: Use qi to purify the body and remove negative effects.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiMovement_Desc: Enhanced movement speed through qi manipulation.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_DiamondBody_Desc: Body becomes as hard as diamond, greatly reducing damage taken.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiBurst_Desc: Explosive release of qi energy, dramatically increasing damage output.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_ElementalAttack_Desc: Powerful elemental attack based on known cultivation techniques.
LanguageData.TuTien_Skill_QiRestoration_Desc: Rapidly restore qi energy over time.
LanguageData.TuTien_Technique_SwordQi_Desc: Ancient sword technique focusing on sharp, precise attacks.
LanguageData.TuTien_Technique_Lightning_Desc: Harness the power of lightning for devastating attacks.
LanguageData.TuTien_Technique_Fire_Desc: Control flames to burn enemies and cause widespread destruction.
LanguageData.TuTien_Technique_Ice_Desc: Manipulate ice and cold to freeze and slow enemies.
LanguageData.TuTien_Technique_Earth_Desc: Command earth and stone for powerful, crushing attacks.
